title.native: 最近、妹のようすがちょっとおかしいんだが。
title.romaji: Saikin, Imouto no Yousu ga Chotto Okashiinda ga.

description: In the romance comedy, a girl named Mitsuki Kanzaki lives with her step-brother Yuya after her mother remarries. One day, Mitsuki is possessed by the self-proclaimed spirit of a young girl, Hiyori Kotobuki. Hiyori (in Mitsuki's body) must fall in love with Yuya to move towards the "Gates of Heaven."

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Inseki
tags.description: Features sexual or romantic relations among step, adopted, and other non-blood related family members.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

node.description:
**Hometown:** Nagano Prefecture, Japan

Hashimoto was inspired to become a voice actress after watching a concert held by the cast of the anime television series Di Gi Charat. Although her parents initially disapproved of her plans, partly as a joke, she enrolled at a voice acting school operated by the agency VIMS. She made her voice acting debut as Mitsuki Kanzaki, the lead character of the 2014 anime television series Recently, My Sister Is Unusual.

(Source: Wikipedia)

Non-Anime Roles: 
- Lucil Filarete/Svetlana Amou (Death End Re;Quest) (VG)

__Height:__ 157 cm (5'2")

[Profile](http://www.pro-baobab.jp/ladies/kanemoto_h/) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/kanemoto-hisako)

Hisako Kanemoto was raised in Okayama Prefecture and attended Kamogata High School. Upon graduation, she enrolled in the voice acting course at the Vocational School of Art College Kobe. After completing her education in 2008, she moved to Tokyo and joined the training office associated with Production Baobab agency.

Early in her career, Kanemoto used the pseudonym _Juri Aikawa_. She made her anime debut in [Sora no Manimani](https://anilist.co/anime/6098) in 2009 under this name. After landing the lead role in [So Ra No Wo](https://anilist.co/anime/6802) To the following year, Kanemoto announced that she would be using her real name in her works moving forward. She was also cast as the title character in [Shinryaku! Ika Musume](https://anilist.co/anime/8557) later that year.

After a breakthrough 2010, Kanemoto was named Best New Actress at the 5th Seiyuu Awards. She has also voiced a number of mascot characters from Okayama Prefecture because of her origin.

Kanemoto made her debut as a solo musical artist in 2014 under Victor Entertainment with the album Fantastic Voyage.

On May 26, 2018 she announced on her official blog that she will take hiatus from professional activities for studying abroad. Her agency Production BAOBAB confirmed her return to work in March 2019.

**Height:** 150 cm

[Website](http://www.ogurayui.jp) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ogurayui-0815) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/OY_A_Official) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/yui_ogura_815) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjoIKN4CybsJyv0pWwAUJ5w) | [LINE](https://lineblog.me/ogurayui) | [Clare Voice](http://clare-voice.co.jp/talent) | [YuiKaori](http://www.yuikaori.info) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27839.html) | [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%80%89%E5%94%AF) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yui_ogura_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@yui_ogura_offcial)

Not to be confused with [Yui Ogura (小倉結衣)](https://anilist.co/staff/123771).

Yui Ogura is an idol, actress, singer and voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with Clare Voice. She is one of four members in Team Dekaris along with Kaori Ishihara, Arisa Noto, and Maho Matsunaga. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Kaori Ishihara](https://anilist.co/staff/105217/) before the group disbanded in 2017. She is a former member of the seiyuu group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177/), which was formed in 2011 and composed of the same members of Team Dekaris. Ogura's debut single "Raise" was released on July 18, 2012. She graduated from the group in April 2013.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/rsknkns)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/rsknkns/)__

Ryousuke Nakanishi is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer and musician, while also known as the representative director of Altus Inc. and managing director Up Dream Inc. He is also a member of the Japanese Society for Rights of Authors, Composers and Publishers.
